stepAnswer: extracts, connects, refines, and transforms large amounts of data into Excel files
stepTitle: What does the Get & Transform power tool work?
choices: extracts, connects, refines, and transforms large amounts of data into Excel files
enables you to import and compare large amounts of data from multiple sources to build analytical relationships
creates an interactive visualization tool used to provide a $$drag-and-drop$$ interface for rapid model building
combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
